metadata.title: CVE-2024-27432 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: ethernet: mtk_eth_soc: fix PPE hanging issueA patch to resolve an issue was found in MediaTek's GPL-licensed SDK:In the mtk_ppe_stop() function, the PPE scan mode is not disabled beforedisabling the PPE. This can potentially lead to a hang during the processof disabling the PPE.Without this patch, the PPE may experience a hang during the reboot test.
